caption.p: Evolution of the antioxidant capacity by the ABTS method in strawberries with chitosan (CT) and treatments of oil (TCEO): T1 = CT, T2 = CT + 0.5% of TCEO, T3 = CT + 1.0% of TCEO, T4 = CT + 1.5% TCEO, and T5 = uncoated throughout a 15-day period. Mean values and intervals of Fisherâ€™s LSD of 95% according to the ANOVA test.
